casebody.data:
PACKERS PRINTING AND PUBLISHING COMPANY, INC. and Packers Printing and Publishing Company, Inc. t/d/b/a Budget Printing, Co.
v.
ANAJET, LLC; and Anajet, LLC t/d/b/a Anajet, Inc. No. 311P14. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. John P. Barringer, Charlotte, for Anajet, LLC, et. al. Jeffrey B. Kuykendal, Charlotte. Boyd Worley, for Packers Printing And Publishing Company, Inc., et. al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 12th of September 2014 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
